title: buvanathrayanutham
sahitya:
saaranga
65 mEca kalyaaNi janya
Aa: S R2 G3 M2 P D2 N3 S
Av: S N3 D2 P M2 R2 G3 M1 R2 S
bhuvanatrayanutam shAstAram bhuvana janAdhAram AshrayAmyaham

anupallavi 

bhava mAdhava sammOhana sUnum bhavAnIsha vAgIsha ramEshanutam

caraNam 1 amritavarshini
66 citraambari janya
Aa: S G3 M2 P N3 S
Av: S N3 P M2 G3 S
kavikula viracita kAvya vibhUSam kavi mAnasa sarOvara hamsam 
kArtikEya gaNanAyaka sOdaram kaivalyAdi kAmita varadam

caraNam 2 sindu bhairavi
10 naaTakapriya janya
Aa: S R2 G2 M1 G2 P D1 N2 S
Av: N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S N2 S
pUrNa candra nibha vadana vilAsam pUrNa puSkalA bpUjita pAdam 
pUrNa dayAnvita sAgara shObham pAvana mInAkSisuta shrita caraNam
